definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sprout, shoot, grow green (As. dašû Pi make abundant Lyon:Sargontexte 77; cf. also sub [[דֶּשֶׁא]], whence, acc. to others, vb. denom.)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תַּדְשֵׁא]] (juss.) Ge 1:11 cause to sprout or shoot forth [[תַּדְשֵׁא הָאָרֶץ דֶּשֶׁא]].—[[דָּשָׁא]] Je 50:11 v. sub [[דּוּשׁ]].
